prompt: A mystical swamp scene with an enchanted lily basin hidden among towering, ancient trees. The water in the basin emits a soothing, ethereal glow and is surrounded by luminescent flowers and creeping vines. Mist swirls gently around the grove, hinting at ancient magic recently disturbed. Fireflies with tiny glowing orbs float above the basin, creating an enchanting atmosphere. The scene is dark and vibrant, with eerie lighting highlighting the lush flora and the soft, magical radiance of the basin area.
